fields.name: New
fields.condition_desc: Brand new with tags and/or in original packaging.

fields.name: Like New
fields.condition_desc: Looks new, excellent condition, used or worn only a few times.

fields.name: Gently Loved
fields.condition_desc: Looks gently used but still in good condition.

fields.name: Well Loved
fields.condition_desc: Has noticeable signs of love and wear and tear such as frayed edges.

fields.name: Distressed
fields.condition_desc: Previously worn, with visible flaws and/or heavy wash and wear. Possibly multiple repairs, loose seams, holes, pulls, fading.
